reviewText: This DVD series is a must have for anyone doing business in China, thinking of doing business in China, or interested in learning about the Chinese business culture. It is well researched and quite informative with direct, insightful reporting.

Over the past 10 years, I have worked and lived abroad in Europe and Australia. I am now contemplating a move to China, however as I recognize that China is a whole other ballgame to Western society and business, I watched the series On the Frontlines: Doing Business in China. The DVD's were very informative and insightful. I feel much better prepared as well as more excited in pursuing business opportunities in China. I highly recommend this series for anyone wanting to do business in China.
